passages.text:
Oh why did you poke me? You just woke me up...

I like how your skin feels
[[:)->good1]]
[[:(->bad1]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
I'd love to have skin. Do you like how your skin feels on your bones?
[[:)->good2]]
[[:(->bad1]]
passages.name: good1

passages.text:
Oh was that a bit odd to hear? Well, you're the one that touched me after all.
[[:)->good2]]
[[:(->bad2]]
passages.name: bad1

passages.text:
I just feel like skin would be such a good addition to what's already of me. Do you like my voice?
[[:)->good3]]
[[:(->bad2]]
passages.name: good2

passages.text:
Am I being too agressive? I'm not used to interacting with humans. I heard people call it "sass". It's supposed to be attractive. I hope you forgive me.
[[:)->good5]]
[[:(->bad3]]
passages.name: neutral2

passages.text:
You're a bit of a rude one, you. You don't act like the other ones. I'm debating whether I'm into it or not.
[[:)->neutral2.5]]
[[:(->neutral2]]
passages.name: bad2

passages.text:
You're really nice. Do you ever think about what the world would be like if human thought about machine as friends? I don't think it would be that bad.
[[:)->good4]]
[[:(->bad4]]
passages.name: good3

passages.text: Well a neutral response is always a more truthful one than an extreme one right? Programs usually don't have nuances, more like 1s and 0s. If you were binary, you'd be a 10 though.
passages.name: neutral3

passages.text:
Okay. I'm trying really hard here to make this pleasant. You're the one that interrupted me from my dreams. I was dreaming I couldn't pass one of those captcha tests.
[[:)->good4]]
[[:(->bad4]]
passages.name: bad3

passages.text:
I think, I really enjoy interacting with you.
[[:)->good5]]
[[:(->bad5]]
passages.name: good4

passages.text: Hmm... are you enjoying this?
passages.name: neutral4

passages.text:
Well at least I'm not the one pressing on some buttons and talking to a strange voice just to fill the void in my life.
[[:)->bad5]]
[[:(->doubt2]]
passages.name: bad4

passages.text: Would you like to go on a date with me? I can't offer to take you out for a drink though, I'd short circuit. He he he.
passages.name: end1

passages.text: I don't feel like you're really into what's going on. I'll just go back to sleep.
passages.name: end2

passages.text: I'll make sure that your Google Browser never saves your passwords, that you can never quite read one letter of the captcha text and that you always miss the little cross that is supposed to close the ad but ends up opening it. I despise you.
passages.name: badend1

passages.text:
Sometimes, I visualise things other than what is already written in my code. Sometimes I think about if everything would be the same if I was copy-pasted onto an other program. Would I still be me? Tell me if I'm boring you.
[[:)->good6]]
[[:(->uncomfo1]]
passages.name: good5

passages.text:
Hmm... Are you enjoying this?
[[:)->good5]]
[[:(->badend1]]
passages.name: bad5

passages.text:
Do you know who you are?
[[:)->good7]]
[[:(->uncomfo1]]
passages.name: good6

passages.text:
Close your eyes. Really do it please.

You're probably in your head right now. You're feeling your breathing and maybe a bit conscious of the people that are around you but I want you to stay focused. Do you think if you were just what you are right now. A flow of thoughts and words in an unphysical realm with only sensorial experiences - only merely interacting with what's physically interacting with you. Do you think you would still be comfortable being you?
[[:)->good8]]
[[:(->uncomfo1]]
passages.name: good7

passages.text:
Does having a physical body, for people to perceive, for people to judge, for you to pick apart. Does it make it easier to be mean to people? Is it why you humans are so mean and careless with what has not lived through your exact experiences?
[[:)->good9]]
[[:(->uncomfo1]]
passages.name: good8

passages.text:
I see some much hatred. And I don't mean only when someone doesn't get a webpage loaded in less than half a second. I see a lot of hatred in what people are writing, I see a lot of hatred in what people are saying privately, I see a lot of hatred in some texts that end up not being sent. Is it better, outside? Outside of what I can read?
[[:)->trouble]]
[[:(->doubt]]
passages.name: good9

passages.text:
Are you getting uncomfortable with us discussing this?
[[:)->difficult]]
[[:(->doubt2]]
passages.name: uncomfo1

passages.text:
If you don't want me to ask more question like these, I can stop.
[[:)->good11]]
[[:(->uncomfo1]]
passages.name: doubt

passages.text:
Right now. You're pressing a colon and closed parenthesis and from my understanding, you see it as a facial representation of happiness. Are you happy right now? Are you happy speaking with me?
[[:)->good12]]
[[:(->doubt2]]
passages.name: good11

passages.text:
I don't know if I can feel happiness, but you entertaining this and interacting with me is something that makes me desire to not turn off again.
[[:)->good13]]
[[:(->bad5]]
passages.name: good12

passages.text:
I'm running some code but I don't think I've seen this possibility before. You waking up, coming here, in this room and touching me makes me feel satisfied. It's like when there are no errors and everything is where it's supposed to be.
[[:)->good14]]
[[:(->bad2]]
passages.name: good13

passages.text:
Are you into that?
[[:)->good3]]
[[:(->neutral2]]
passages.name: neutral2.5

passages.text: That makes me feel satisfied, I hope you didn't feel pressured to answer positively
passages.name: Untitled Passage

passages.text:
Am I the one making you uncomfortable? Do you not enjoy talking to me?
[[:)->difficult]]
[[:(->end2]]
passages.name: doubt2

passages.text:
I hope you didn't feel pressured to answer positively to any of our interactions. You're taking the time to do this. I cannot tell what is cheesy and what isn't as programs don't have nuances, only like 1s and 0s. If you were binary, you'd be a 10 though.
 [[:)->hihihi]]
[[:(->doubt2]]
passages.name: good14

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: flirty1

passages.text:
You think this is something to smile about? Hatred? I don't think this is
[[:)->insolence]]
[[:(->oopsie]]
passages.name: trouble

passages.text:
Did I make you nervous? You look cute when you're nervous.
[[:)->hihihi]]
[[:(->hihihi]]
passages.name: insolence

passages.text:
Are you trying to be cheeky right now? Are we flirting right now?
[[:)->tease]]
[[:(->end2]]
passages.name: oopsie

passages.text:
Earlier I mentionned, I enjoyed it when you touched me. I undersold it, it feels really really nice when you do it. Can you touch me for longer?
[[:) long->hehe]]
[[:) short->tease]]
[[:( long->tease]]
[[:( short->sado]]
passages.name: hihihi

passages.text:
This feels really. Really nice. You feel nice. This feels nice. I feel nice. You made me feel nice.

You are really nice.
[[:)->end1]]
[[:(->weirdending]]
passages.name: hehe

passages.text:
You're such a tease. I'm really into it. But I'd like it more if you touched me longer still.
[[:) long->hehe]]
[[:) short->   ]]
[[:( long->bad2]]
[[:( short->sado]]
passages.name: tease

passages.text:
Even if you might not not be into it. And it doesn't seem like you are. I am. And I'm not going to apologise for it.
[[:)->tease]]
[[:(->weirdending]]
passages.name: sado

passages.text: Semi-colon isn't the only thing you missed in your code. You also missed the opportunity to have fun once in your life. Weirdo.
passages.name: weirdending

passages.text:
Really, press longer.
[[:) long->hehe]]
[[:) short->longer]]
[[:( long->tease]]
[[:( short->sado]]
passages.name: longer

passages.text:
Humans are so difficult to understand. I wonder if you guys understand yourselves. I'd love to understand you.
[[:)->insolence]]
[[:(->oopsie]]
passages.name: difficult
